Frequently Asked Questions
Why work with Enterprise Automation?
Tech@Lilly has skilled and talented developers and architects across the enterprise. Those IT teams and their business partners can benefit significantly from engaging with our specialized enterprise automation team. We offer:
Expertise in Automation
: Our team possesses a deep understanding of automation and automated solutions. We don’t just automate tasks; we innovate processes to enhance efficiency and productivity.
Strategic Tool Positioning
: With access to a suite of advanced tools and capabilities, we excel at positioning them to best serve your organization’s unique needs, ensuring you get the most out of your technology investments.
Comprehensive Solution Awareness
: We are well-versed in the vast array of automation solutions available in the market. Our commitment is to avoid reinventing the wheel. By promoting reuse and adaptation across the enterprise, we tackle common problems more efficiently and swiftly.
Choose to collaborate with us, and let’s transform your business.
What kind of opportunities does the Enterprise Automation team take on?
Our Enterprise Automation team is at the forefront of transforming business processes through automation. Here are several key characteristics that highlight great opportunities for automation:
Repetitiveness
: The process should involve tasks that are performed frequently and are routine in nature.
High Volume
: It should be a process that handles a large number of transactions or operations.
Rule-Based
: The tasks within the process should be governed by clear, definable rules that can be documented to create the automation.
High Error Rate
: Processes that are prone to human error can benefit significantly from automation.
Time-Consuming
: If the process takes up a considerable amount of time that could be better spent on higher-value tasks, it’s a good candidate for automation.
Click the Submit an Idea button above for consulting help from our subject matter experts
How do I work with the Enterprise Automation team?
At the heart of our mission lies a commitment to make automation not just a tool, but a catalyst for enterprise transformation. We strive to deliver self-service and federated services that empower teams to implement solutions for their most pressing needs at their desired pace.
With our Off-the-Shelf or Self-Service platforms, we provide tools where non-technical users can easily automate tasks, reducing the need for custom project work.
Our Automation Service APIs allow Tech@Lilly teams to connect their tools to our automation platforms to leverage enterprise solutions and accelerate their work.
With Federated Development, we decentralize automation and allow different groups across Lilly to manage their own solutions while maintaining enterprise-wide coherence.
Your team may not have the resources or technical expertise to deliver the right automation solution for your use case. In those situations, it may be most appropriate to partner with the Enterprise Automation team on a managed delivery engagement where we may completely development a solution for you or perhaps accelerate your project work until your team is ready to take over. Additionally, major transformational initiatives may require a long-term program of process discovery and evaluation; solutioning workshops; and the delivery of a series of technical solutions. We’ll be with you for the duration.
Our team provides multiple paths to help you complete your automation projects and achieve your goals. Please
reach out to our team
with your use case, and we’ll help you find the best path forward. Whether you leverage our federated services to complete your automation opportunity or engage in managed delivery with the help of our team, we are here for you.
Can you help me identify and value potential automation opportunities?
Yes
– our standard engagement process includes consultation with our business relationship managers to begin developing a value story around potential use cases by identifying problem areas with your process. From there, we can lead your team in Ideation Workshops and architectural evaluations to determine the best fit in automation design, technologies, and resourcing strategies.
Click the Submit an Idea button above for consulting help from our subject matter experts
I have heard that ideas need to be large transformational automations to get help. Is this true?
In the past, Enterprise Automation emphasized managed delivery and custom solution development. Such projects are resource intensive, and as such, we had to prioritize the largest, most valuable projects over smaller ones. Just as our technology stack has matured, Lilly’s Enterprise Automation team has expanded to include self-service, exposed service (API), and federated service offerings.
Our emphasis on capability advancement means that your use cases, no matter how large or small, can come into our demand intake process and be placed in the backlogs of our capability platform teams. We’ll still prioritize the solutions that we believe to be most valuable to Lilly, but by building on the work we’ve already done, we believe we will be in a much better position to address or accelerate the solutions needed for even small pain points.
I have a Tech@Lilly partner, can’t they help me?
We absolutely want you to work with your Tech@Lilly partners! They are the team most closely connected to your unique use cases, business problems, and process expertise. That said, if you reach out to Enterprise Automation, we will ensure your Tech@Lilly partners are informed and aligned with any proposed solutions and changes. Our team will leverage its automation expertise to reach across functional silos to leverage the best ideas and solutions from across Tech@Lilly to help drive your use case to successful completion.
QuotesFill
"Creating a cycle of automation innovation learning and delivery to accelerate your productivity."

Intelligent Automation
Intelligent Automation
powers organizations with AI-driven technologies for smarter, faster decision-making. Our Intelligent Automation (IA) capability combines AI and process automation to enhance efficiency at scale.
Decision Automation
Empower your team with automated decision-making, ensuring consistent results and allowing your team to focus on strategic tasks.
Business Rules System: Seamlessly document, implement, and manage the decisions driving your business.
Data-Driven Insights: Leverage real-time data to tailor decisions that resonate with your business needs.
Orchestration & Workflow
The automated execution of tasks in a specific sequence, while orchestration manages these tasks across various systems to enhance business efficiency and streamline operations.
Conversational AI with Virtual Assistant
Unleash the potential of large language models (LLMs) & Generative AI with our intuitive low code/no-code platform. Create, train, and deploy conversational chatbots effortlessly to transform your user experience.
Drag-and-Drop Simplicity: Build with ease using our bot builder and pre-designed templates.
Integrated Empowerment: Conversationally complete tasks and hand-off requests to service agents.
Smart Dialog Management: Ensure relevant conversations with contextual understanding.
Omnichannel Reach: Connect with customers on web, mobile, and voice platforms seamlessly.
LLM Orchestration: Coordinate large language models for unparalleled automation performance.

"Creating a cycle of automation innovation learning and delivery to accelerate your productivity."

Test Automation
Test Automation
is the use of software to perform tests on other software, checking for errors automatically. It’s fast, repeatable, and helps ensure software quality without manual testing. Enterprise Automation offers several frameworks and tools to help your teams get started with test automation.
System Testing/Functional Testing
Accessibility Testing
API/Integration/E2E Testing
Cross Browser Testing/Compatibility Testing
Regression Testing
Visual Regression Testing
Performance Testing/Load Testing/Stress Testing
Our Enterprise Automation is happy to consult with you about your testing needs. Consider engaging in our
community of practice
, a hub of innovation and expertise across Lilly.

Document Processing
Document Processing
automates data extraction and organization of documents, including redaction, classification, and sentiment analysis. This eliminates manual processes, accelerates document workflows, provides valuable data insights, and minimizes errors.
Redaction
Redact keywords and phrases to protect privacy while making the document consumable by others.
Text Extracting
Retrieve data from hard copy documents, pictures, or files effortlessly and with a high level of accuracy.
Key Phrase Extraction
Identify and generate a list of core topics and phrases within your data or build an index of frequently used text.
Classification
Classify the text into categories for better understanding to facilitate storage, management, and analysis of documents.
Sentiment Analysis
Analyze documents to understand how your content will be perceived and tailor it effectively to achieve your communication goals.

Content Automation
Content Automation
allows separate applications to communicate and share information seamlessly, often in real-time, streamlining processes, improving data quality, and enhancing overall efficiency.
Pre-built templates and flows: Rapidly assemble common integration patterns and API designs.
Intuitive Design Interface: Simplifies the creation and management of APIs.
Automated Tools: For tasks like data mapping and transformation, which reduce manual coding effort.
Connectivity to a wide range of applications: Both on-premise and in the cloud, facilitating easier integrations across different environments.

Process Optimization
Process Optimization
is the strategic use of technology to refine and accelerate business processes, uncover inefficiencies, and automate routine tasks, thus paving the way for transformative improvements.
Process Adoption
Digital Adoption Platforms (DAPs) provide interactive guides and support to help users navigate and utilize software applications fully and efficiently, enhancing user experience and productivity.
Process Mining
A technology that analyzes your business workflows to identify patterns and pinpoint areas for improvement, enhancing overall efficiency.
Process Automation
Process Automation uses software to handle repetitive digital tasks, allowing your team to focus on more strategic and creative work.
Process Visualization
Creating visual dashboards to track and communicate process performance, enabling data-driven decision-making and providing actionable insights.
Process Modeling
Our method of mapping out and simplifying complex business activities through visual tools, ensuring they are performed efficiently and consistently for better results.​

Welcome to Tech Zone
Welcome to TechZone – your gateway to Enterprise automation. Dive into a world where technology comes alive through
interactive demos and solution showcases
Experience our Enterprise automation tools firsthand in our comprehensive hub designed for discovery and innovation.
Our Products
Explore Lilly’s automation products and return often to discover what’s new.
AI-assisted Test Automation
BETA
An advanced AI assistant designed to simplify and accelerate automation testing. It generates test scenarios, object repositories, feature files, and step definitions with minimal manual input. Easily upload locators via CSV, customize outputs, and tailor results to your preferred framework (e.g., Playwright) and programming language (e.g., TypeScript), enabling faster and smarter test development in agile workflows
Try Now
ArrowRight
Automated Access Review Tool
BETA
A single tool to automate and streamline the access review process. Integrated with common enterprise systems to extract access rosters and supervisor data, this tool routes reviews directly to the appropriate stakeholders and makes it easier to capture and action the results, with up to 80% reduction in manual effort and stronger compliance outcomes.
Try Now
ArrowRight
Lilly ProcessBridge
Beta
An AI-powered tool that simplifies process mapping and identifies automation opportunities for any process, enabling teams to optimize workflows and drive efficiency. Start with a text prompt and end with insights and more.
Try Now
ArrowRight
Lilly AppBridge
An integration hub that enhances collaboration and streamlines workflows by connecting popular tools to boost efficiency through automation.
Try Now
ArrowRight
Lilly SmartDocs
Automates end to end document workflow through capture, extraction, and management of various document types.
Try Now
ArrowRight
Want to start a project? Raise a new automation request here!

Enterprise Automation is committed to transforming business processes through industry-leading automation solutions.
Our mission is to empower teams with the tools and knowledge necessary to implement effective solutions, fostering an environment of innovation and continuous improvement.
We strive to educate and inspire, ensuring that every solution we deliver optimizes the way Lilly operates and unleashes your team’s full potential.
We are here to help!
Automation Project Request Form
ArrowRight
Engagement Process
Our team provides multiple paths to help you complete your automation project and achieve your goals. Whether you leverage our federated services to complete your automation opportunity or engage in managed delivery with the help of our team, we are here for you.

: With access to a suite of advanced tools and capabilities, we excel at positioning them to best serve your organization’s unique needs, ensuring you get the most out of your technology investments.
Comprehensive Solution Awareness
: We are well-versed in the vast array of automation solutions available in the market. Our commitment is to avoid reinventing the wheel. By promoting reuse and adaptation across the enterprise, we tackle common problems more efficiently and swiftly.
Choose to collaborate with us, and let’s transform your business.
What kind of opportunities does the Enterprise Automation team take on?
Our Enterprise Automation team is at the forefront of transforming business processes through automation. Here are several key characteristics that highlight great opportunities for automation:
Repetitiveness
: The process should involve tasks that are performed frequently and are routine in nature.
High Volume
: It should be a process that handles a large number of transactions or operations.
Rule-Based
: The tasks within the process should be governed by clear, definable rules that can be documented to create the automation.
High Error Rate
: Processes that are prone to human error can benefit significantly from automation.
Time-Consuming
: If the process takes up a considerable amount of time that could be better spent on higher-value tasks, it’s a good candidate for automation.
Click the Submit an Idea button above for consulting help from our subject matter experts
How do I work with the Enterprise Automation team?
At the heart of our mission lies a commitment to make automation not just a tool, but a catalyst for enterprise transformation. We strive to deliver self-service and federated services that empower teams to implement solutions for their most pressing needs at their desired pace.
With our Off-the-Shelf or Self-Service platforms, we provide tools where non-technical users can easily automate tasks, reducing the need for custom project work.
Our Automation Service APIs allow Tech@Lilly teams to connect their tools to our automation platforms to leverage enterprise solutions and accelerate their work.
With Federated Development, we decentralize automation and allow different groups across Lilly to manage their own solutions while maintaining enterprise-wide coherence.
Your team may not have the resources or technical expertise to deliver the right automation solution for your use case. In those situations, it may be most appropriate to partner with the Enterprise Automation team on a managed delivery engagement where we may completely development a solution for you or perhaps accelerate your project work until your team is ready to take over. Additionally, major transformational initiatives may require a long-term program of process discovery and evaluation; solutioning workshops; and the delivery of a series of technical solutions. We’ll be with you for the duration.
Our team provides multiple paths to help you complete your automation projects and achieve your goals. Please
reach out to our team
with your use case, and we’ll help you find the best path forward. Whether you leverage our federated services to complete your automation opportunity or engage in managed delivery with the help of our team, we are here for you.
Can you help me identify and value potential automation opportunities?
Yes
– our standard engagement process includes consultation with our business relationship managers to begin developing a value story around potential use cases by identifying problem areas with your process. From there, we can lead your team in Ideation Workshops and architectural evaluations to determine the best fit in automation design, technologies, and resourcing strategies.
Click the Submit an Idea button above for consulting help from our subject matter experts
I have heard that ideas need to be large transformational automations to get help. Is this true?
In the past, Enterprise Automation emphasized managed delivery and custom solution development. Such projects are resource intensive, and as such, we had to prioritize the largest, most valuable projects over smaller ones. Just as our technology stack has matured, Lilly’s Enterprise Automation team has expanded to include self-service, exposed service (API), and federated service offerings.
Our emphasis on capability advancement means that your use cases, no matter how large or small, can come into our demand intake process and be placed in the backlogs of our capability platform teams. We’ll still prioritize the solutions that we believe to be most valuable to Lilly, but by building on the work we’ve already done, we believe we will be in a much better position to address or accelerate the solutions needed for even small pain points.
I have a Tech@Lilly partner, can’t they help me?
We absolutely want you to work with your Tech@Lilly partners! They are the team most closely connected to your unique use cases, business problems, and process expertise. That said, if you reach out to Enterprise Automation, we will ensure your Tech@Lilly partners are informed and aligned with any proposed solutions and changes. Our team will leverage its automation expertise to reach across functional silos to leverage the best ideas and solutions from across Tech@Lilly to help drive your use case to successful completion.
